title: 3 BD 2 BTH*1,500 SF SINGLE HOME**2 CAR GARAGE**ASAP MOVE-IN**
posting_body: $1,700 - 3 BD 2 BTH 2 car garage single home with ALL appliances AS/IS.
PESHREALTY.COM for more info or call Scott for showing
We offer two ways to qualify for leasing our properties.
**YOU MUST HAVE ALL 3 ITEMS FROM QUALIFIED OR YOU WILL BE REQUIRED TO DO NON-QUALIFIED**
The amount for security deposit depends on background issues.
If someone had an eviction or F.E.D. within 6 months versus someone with bankruptcy 5 yrs ago, deposit may be different.
Before anyone visits a property I will ask them their information.
Based on what they tell me I can give them a very good idea of deposit.
If we find anything more in the background check, then deposit amount would be adjusted.
We always recommend you drive by first to make sure the property is located where you need to be before making an appointment to see the inside.
